name: ice-burn
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.sword-shield: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.
